action.action-desc: Mr. Tonko introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to allow for medical assistance under Medicaid for inmates during the 30-day period preceding release from a public institution.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Medicaid Reentry Act.

section.header: Allowing for medical assistance under Medicaid for inmates during 30-day period preceding release
section.text: The subdivision (A) following paragraph (29) of section 1905(a) of the Social Security Act (42 U.S.C. 1396d(a)) is amended by inserting and except during the 30-day period preceding the date of release of such individual from such public institution after medical institution.
